arts.sum: Gleison Bremer returns to the Juventus starting XI for a home Serie A game against...

In Serie A 2024/25, Atalanta recorded their biggest ever win at Juventus in the history of the 70 previous official matches (0-4), with goals from Retegui, Lookman, De Roon, and Zappacosta. There have been 70 previous official matches between the two teams in Turin, with Juventus winning 44, drawing 20, and Atalanta winning 6.
